name: Greyskull defenders
description:
The most ultimate game that combines tower defence and arcade gaming in one awesome play!

Greyskull defenders - Eliminate trolls, skulls and tons of other creatures that are lurking in the shaddows!

Beloved by millions of players online and finally released on IOS - Grab yourself a bargain!

Collect coins while playing to unlock potions and powers
Gain magical powers and unlock new players and skills to kill the intruders and enemies.
Unlock dozens of awesome levels - all with different tasks to complete!

Become the new Grayskull champion and clear all evil away.

This is THE most awesome game, don´t miss out on this awesome defender saga,
a trulu must have in any gaming collection!
